description: Compress, or uncompress files, detect duplicates, catalog, manage CHD and DAT data, sort for Everdrive, or create 1G1R sets - all with one app
notes: ROMSorter depends on having .NET 6 runtimes installed.
.NET 6 runtimes, also known as Microsoft Windows Desktop Runtimes - LTS, is available in the Extras bucket.
Since the runtimes get installed globally, Sudo is needed, which is part of the Main bucket.
